Reviews.Title: Not as nice as Kindle Fire, but very nice at half the price!
Reviews.Author: P. Parsons "Papi"
Reviews.Content: Nice little droid product. Comes with charger, cable to fit regular USB, and stylus. It also came with screen cover! I bought this for one of the kids, and found it's nice enough for adult daily use! The manufacture packs item in an awesome bubble sleeve to protect it from most any postal damage.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: dan
Reviews.Content: Other than having to wait a extra week for shipping and the battery having a short 3 hr cycle it works great.Wish i had bought 2 now. Also it only has one speaker so if want to listen to music u need headphones.Also i can be slow at times too but for the price its a great bargain.

ProductInfo.Features:
5 Points Capacitive Touch Screen
Cheap and Well Built
CE Approved Including Accessories
Android 4.1 - Full Google Play Store - Tons of apps to download
Free Capacitive Stylus & Screen Protector
ProductInfo.Name: Halloween Onebook Genius Blue Tablet PC - Version Android 4.1- Super Slim and Light 7" Google Android Tablet PC with 1.5Ghz Processor and 4GB Storage
